name: Welcome to Dreamville
description:
Description

Money or the lives of the inhabitants of a mysterious city? Welcome to Dreamville. A paradise for those who are tired of the hustle and bustle of the city. Great nature and quiet neighbors - sometimes only this is enough for happiness. Have you decided to earn money? Great! Locals always need sleeping pills. Explore a mysterious town, search for recipes, collect important resources, create sleeping pills and sell them. But be prepared, this place does not forgive mistakes.

Features

  • Mushrooms and flowers — If you prepare a sleeping pill, then only from natural ingredients. We collect fragrant forest flowers, do not forget to grab a couple of mushrooms and collect water. Great! It remains to add the ingredients in the correct proportion according to the recipe!
  • It won't work without a prescription — The ingredients alone will not be enough to prepare the necessary sleeping pills. We need to get a recipe, what a blessing that someone has hidden them all over the city. A little care and you will easily collect everything.
  • Great nature — No harmful industries, poachers and only responsible behavior of local residents were able to preserve the nature of Dreamville. You can search for different animals yourself and even shelter some of them at your base!
  • Try not to die — With each of your deaths, the game becomes more difficult, but don't worry, you can always start over.
